items.text: length on middle, pushed back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williamson, no run

items.text: slower ball, short outside off, Williamson cuts again and it falls tantalizingly short of point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williamson, 1 run

items.text: length on middle, defended
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, no run

items.text: short outside off, Williamson goes back and punched it through the covers for two
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Williamson, 2 runs

items.text: tossed up on middle, comes forward and defends
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Williamson, no run

items.text: another mix up and have they got Taylor now? It was nudged to the leg side, it was a tight run as it went straight to the fielder, he hurled the throw back in but it was a little wide of Mushfiqur, who had to drag it back on to the stumps, which allowed Taylor time to stretch his way home, and it was a full stretch
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Williamson, 1 run
Shakib Al Hasan to Taylor, no run

items.text: full on the pads, tucked away through square leg for one
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: full on middle, defended
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Williamson, no run

items.text: short outside off, punched to deep cover
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: length on middle, whipped aerially towards midwicket but short of the man
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williamson, no run

items.text: slower ball outside off, swerved away a little as Williamson went for the drive, gets an outside edge, a thick one, past point and down to third-man for one
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williamson, 1 run

items.text: length on the pads, tucked away to deep square leg for one
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: slower ball outside off, waits for it and runs it down to third-man
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williamson, 1 run

items.text: short one on middle, Taylor gets into position and on top of the bounce and hammers it in front off  square for four
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, FOUR runs

items.preText: Ibrahim: "When you have a better keeper in the squad, and who can be better a batsman than one of your current low-middle order batsman, and you still keep fielding an average wicket-keeper, you are not winning close matches. Absurd. Frustrating. Infuriating."
items.text: tossed up on off, and nearly chipped back to the bowler
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Williamson, no run

items.text: tossed up on middle, Williamson defends
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Williamson, no run

items.text: shortens his length, it's the one that goes on with the arm, hurries onto Williamson but he manages to push it to cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Williamson, no run

items.text: full on off, pushed to mid-off and they come through for a quick single
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Williamson, 1 run

items.text: short outside off, cut away to deep cover for one
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, squeezed away to short third man for one
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Williamson, 1 run

items.preText:
Dean Kay: "Please Ross and Kane. get the communication sorted. its criminal if either if you get run out. its even more criminal if one of you runs the other out! stop it!"

Rohan Naik: "Taylor-made conditions for kiwis here.. They will sail through it and claim their second victory of the tournament tonight! I am vouching for them - Go Kiwi Go!!"

Imtiaz Awan: "Looks like NZ batsmen trying to run themselves out. No need to panic. Watching from a remote town in Florida."
items.text: full on off, comes forward and defends
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williamson, no run

items.text: length on middle, pushed to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williamson, no run

items.text: full on middle, comes forward and turns it to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williamson, no run

items.text: goes shorter and outside off, Williamson waits for it and places it nicely behind point, times it well and collects four
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williamson, FOUR runs
